card.text: Rush. Whenever an allied Machina or Natura follower attacks, recover 1 play point. At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower. Then, if you have at least 3, deal 3 damage to all enemies.

card.name: Spinaria, Keeper of the End
card.text: Accelerate (1): Summon a Spinaria's Artifact. ---------- Fanfare: Choose - Summon 2 of the following cards. If at least 6 allied Artifact cards with different names have been destroyed this match, summon all 3 instead. -Airstrike Artifact -Keenedge Artifact -Barrier Artifact
card.related: Spinaria, Keeper of the End Evolved

card.text: Fanfare: Randomly summon copies of different allied Artifact followers destroyed during this match until your area is full.

card.name: Electromagical Rhino
card.text: Rush. Fanfare: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of remaining Artifact cards in your deck. Strike: Put 3 Artifact Rhinos into your deck.

card.name: Silva, Ardent Sniper
card.text: Accelerate (3): Put a follower that originally costs 3 play points or less from your hand into play and give it Rush. Give your leader the following effect: Once on each of your turns, when an allied follower attacks, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect lasts for the rest of the match.) ---------- Ambush.

card.text: Rush. Fanfare: Put a Gullian Aura and a Gullian Howl into your hand. Whenever this follower takes damage, if this follower is not destroyed, summon an Assembly Droid.

card.text: Invocation: At the start of your turn, if at least 20 allied followers have been destroyed this match, invoke this card. ---------- Ward. Fanfare: Put a Dead to Rights into your hand. When this follower comes into play, summon a Magitrain.

card.name: Colossus Omega

card.name: Magna Zero
card.text: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to all enemies. If Resonance has been activated for you at least 10 times this match, deal 10 damage instead. If it has been activated for you at least 20 times, deal 20 damage instead.

card.text: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact follower that costs 3 play points or less from your deck into play. Repeat once if Resonance is active for you.

card.name: Sylvia, the Condemner

X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match.

card.name: Mobilized Factory
card.text: Crystallize (5): During your turn, whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give it Rush, recover 1 play point, and draw a card. ---------- Fanfare: Give +X/+X and Storm to another random allied follower. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match.

card.name: Omniscient Kaiser
card.text: Accelerate (1): Select a card in your hand and banish the rest. Draw a card for each card you banished. If this is your first turn, draw 1 more. ---------- Fanfare: Deal 7 damage to the enemy leader and a random enemy follower. Restore 7 defense to your leader. Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
